name: Mandala #1
description: Bred by Mandala Seeds, Mandala #1 is a hybrid strain with genetic roots in South Africa, New Zealand, and Northern India. Dreamy euphoria illuminates the mind, waking creativity and happiness with a sweet fragrance of apples, raspberry, and mint. Mandala #1 may hit like a sativa, but to the delight of commercial growers, it grows like an indica with a short flowering cycle of just 55 to 60 daysÂ
attributes_title: Euphoric, Creative, Energetic, Uplifted, Happy, Headaches, Nausea, Depression, Stress, Dry Mouth, Anxious, Dry Eyes, Paranoid
